description:
Ever since Boyd came out for his first visit, he's been fascinated with the "big tub". He really wanted to do a video in it.

Boyd had met a Spence a couple of times, and they'd actually hung out together with a friend of Spence's. So, when Boyd asked to do a video with Spence I was all for it!

They both seemed to love the tub and while soaking they exchanged stories about girls, and compared muscles, butts, and tattoos. Making the first move isn't exactly Spence's strongest skill, but Boyd is another story.

Boyd is very charming and I loved how he gradually built up to their first kiss. Of course, once the ice was broken, Spence turned into a virtual fuck machine!
title: Boyd & Spence
